sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Setting off from Lombardy on Wednesday night, they travelled about 240 kilometres to represent Italian farmers in their protest at the televised festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In Bulgaria, protests and road blockages continued for a third consecutive day across the country.

sentences.sentence: France has unveiled its medals for the 2024 Paris Olympics, and they're monumental.

sentences.sentence: So, on top of making history, medalists will take a bit of France and its iconic landmark home with them too. Donc, en plus de faire de l'histoire, les medalistes vont prendre un peu de France et de son landmark iconique à la maison avec eux.
